title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\SampleConfig
name: SampleConfig
description:
Active learning data sampling config. For every active learning labeling iteration, it will select a batch of data based on the sampling strategy.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.SampleConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.initial_batch_sample_percentage
params.description: The percentage of data needed to be labeled in the first batch.

params.name: data.following_batch_sample_percentage
params.description: The percentage of data needed to be labeled in each following batch (except the first batch).

params.name: data.sample_strategy
params.description: Field to choose sampling strategy. Sampling strategy will decide which data should be selected for human labeling in every batch.

methods.description:
